Directions: In a large nonstick skillet, saute carrots in oil for 10 minutes. Add zucchini; saute 10 minutes longer or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Sprinkle with vinegar, Italian seasoning and salt; toss.
Ingredients: 1 pound carrots, cut into 2-inch julienne strips
3/4 pound zucchini, cut into 2-inch julienne strips
